price: O da onlara (Kur'an'ı Arapça) okusaydı, yine de ona iman edecek değillerdi.
arabic: فَقَرَأَهُۥ عَلَيۡهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ مُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: faqara-ahu ʿalayhim mā kānū bihi mu'minīna
